Name: BENS013 - Callcredit Service Call with UC
Output_template:
{"version":"1","link":"http://localhost/CallCredit/CallCreditService.svc?singleWsdl","wsdl_lim":"83ef69d1-2c5e-11e5-ad20-22000a7a05f5","endpoint":"http://localhost/CallCredit/CallCreditService.svc","SOAPAction":"http://firmstep.com/CallCredit/ICallCreditService/GetClaimVerification","expected_response_format":"text/xml","secure_fields_db_webservice":"","auth_type":"","payload":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
    xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
<soap:Body>
	<GetClaimVerification
		xmlns="http://firmstep.com/CallCredit">
		<claimApplication>
			<HB_CTB_Application xmlns="urn:core_e-nbp-gov-uk:HB_CTB_Application-v1.0">
				<Header>
					<Advisor>
			<!--@af:if({CoC_ClaimantName/First_Name_out}='xyz321') -->
				<break>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<InternalAdvisorId>{BensIntAdvisorID}</InternalAdvisorId>
						<AdvisorName>
							<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">
							web</PersonGivenName>
							<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">
							user</PersonFamilyName>
							<PersonRequestedName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">
							Auto Web</PersonRequestedName>
						</AdvisorName>
						<AdvisorLocalAuthorityCode>011709</AdvisorLocalAuthorityCode>
						<AdvisorType>LA</AdvisorType>
					</Advisor>
					<Security>
						<SourceId>{BensSourceID}</SourceId>
						<UserId>{BensSourceID}</UserId>
						<SourceUserId>{BensSourceID}</SourceUserId>
					</Security>
				</Header>
				<General>
					<!--@af:if({UCund}!='CTR') -->
						<ApplyForHB>yes</ApplyForHB>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({UCund}='CTR') -->
						<ApplyForHB>no</ApplyForHB>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({checkCTLiability}='1') -->
						<ApplyForCTB>yes</ApplyForCTB>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({checkCTLiability}='0') -->
						<ApplyForCTB>no</ApplyForCTB>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<ApplyForFSL>no</ApplyForFSL>
					<HBEffectiveDate>{today}</HBEffectiveDate>
					<CTBEffectiveDate>{today}</CTBEffectiveDate>
					<PhoneNumbers>
						<!--@af:if({CoC_ClaimantName/Phone_Number_out}='do not use') -->
						<PhoneNumber>
							<TelNationalNumber xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/AddressAndPersonalDetails">{CoC_ClaimantName/Phone_Number_out}</TelNationalNumber>
						</PhoneNumber>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({CoC_ClaimantName/Mobile_Number_out}='do not use') -->
						<PhoneNumber TelMobile="yes">
							<TelNationalNumber xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/AddressAndPersonalDetails">{CoC_ClaimantName/Mobile_Number_out}</TelNationalNumber>
						</PhoneNumber>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</PhoneNumbers>
					<!--@af:if({havePartner}='1 do not use') -->
						<PartnerPhoneNumbers>
							<!--@af:if({houseHoldMember_Partner/Phone_Number_cl}='do not use') -->
							<PhoneNumber>
								<TelNationalNumber xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/AddressAndPersonalDetails">{houseHoldMember_Partner/Phone_Number_cl}</TelNationalNumber>
							</PhoneNumber>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</PartnerPhoneNumbers>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<ConsentSupplied>yes</ConsentSupplied>
					<SupportingDocumentsSupplied>yes</SupportingDocumentsSupplied>
					<HBDateOfClaim>{today}</HBDateOfClaim>
					<!--@af:if({checkCTLiability}='1') -->
						<CTBDateOfClaim>{today}</CTBDateOfClaim>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->	
					<DateOfFirstContact>{today}</DateOfFirstContact>
					<!--@af:if({Are_you_seeking_to_claim_backdated_benefits_}='yes') -->
						<BackdatingInformation>
							<HBBackdatingDate>{xml_HBBackdatingDate}</HBBackdatingDate>
							<CTBBackdatingDate>{xml_HBBackdatingDate}</CTBBackdatingDate>
							<!--@af:if({xml_BackdatingNotes}!='') -->
								<BackdatingNotes>{xml_BackdatingNotes}</BackdatingNotes>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</BackdatingInformation>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--  do we need to send ethnicity #################
					<Ethnicity>{Ethnicity:string}</Ethnicity>
					-->
					<CRMReference>{reference}</CRMReference>
					<ContactAddress>
						<Line>{CoC_ClaimantName/AddrConcat}</Line>
						<Line>a</Line>
					</ContactAddress>
					<!--@af:if({CoC_ClaimantName/Email_Address}!='') -->
						<eMailAddress>{CoC_ClaimantName/Email_Address_out}</eMailAddress>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<SourceOfHBClaim>EChannelClaim</SourceOfHBClaim>
					<!--@af:if({checkCTLiability}='1') -->
						<SourceOfCTBClaim>EChannelClaim</SourceOfCTBClaim>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
				</General>
				<Property>
					<GeneralPropertyInformation>
						<PropertyAddress>
							<Line>{CoC_ClaimantName/AddrConcat}</Line>
							<Line>a</Line>
							<PostCode>{CoC_ClaimantName/upPostcode_out}</PostCode>
						</PropertyAddress>
						<!--@af:if({needPropertyDetail}=1 and {UCund}='Eligible') -->
						<PropertyType>{xml_PropertyType}</PropertyType>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</GeneralPropertyInformation>
					<TenancyDetail>
						<HouseholdType>{xml_HouseholdType_rbv}</HouseholdType>
						<!--@af:if({needPropertyDetail}=1 and {UCund}='Eligible') -->
							<!--@af:if({xml_TenancyStartDate}!='') -->
								<TenancyStartDate>{xml_TenancyStartDate}</TenancyStartDate>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_JointTenants}='yes') -->
								<JointTenants>{xml_JointTenants_Count}</JointTenants>
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_JointTenantDetails}) -->
									<JointTenantDetails>
										<Name>
											<!--@af:if({xml_JointTenantDetails/xml_PersonGivenName}!='') -->
												<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{xml_JointTenantDetails/xml_PersonGivenName}</PersonGivenName>
											<!--@endaf:if end-->
											<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{xml_JointTenantDetails/xml_PersonFamilyName}</PersonFamilyName>
										</Name>
									</JointTenantDetails>
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</TenancyDetail>
					<!--@af:if({needPropertyDetail}=1 and {UCund}!='CTR') -->
					<PropertyDetail>
						<!--@af:if({xml_NumberOfFloors}!='') -->
							<NumberOfFloors>{xml_NumberOfFloors}</NumberOfFloors>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({xml_RoomLocation}!='') -->
							<RoomLocation>{xml_RoomLocation}</RoomLocation>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({xml_Decoration}!='') -->
							<Decoration>{xml_Decoration}</Decoration>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<HowMuchFurniture>{xml_HowMuchFurniture}</HowMuchFurniture>
						<CentralHeating>{xml_CentralHeating}</CentralHeating>
						<!--@af:if({Rent_Includes_GarageParking/Includes}!='') -->
							<Garage>{Rent_Includes_GarageParking/Includes}</Garage>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<RoomsInHouse>
							<!--@af:if({xml_PartofBuilding}='no') -->
							<!--@af:repeat({xml_RoomsInHouse}) -->
							<!--@af:if({xml_RoomsInHouse/totalForPropertyB}!=0) -->
							<Room RoomType="{xml_RoomsInHouse/xml_typeOfRoom}" NumberInBuilding="{xml_RoomsInHouse/totalForPropertyB}" ExclusivelyForYou="{xml_RoomsInHouse/totalForPropertyB}" SharedWithOthers="0" />
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_PartofBuilding}='yes') -->
							<!--@af:repeat({xml_RoomsInHouse}) -->
							<!--@af:if({xml_RoomsInHouse/totalForPropertyB}!=0) -->
							<Room RoomType="{xml_RoomsInHouse/xml_typeOfRoom}" NumberInBuilding="{xml_RoomsInHouse/totalForPropertyB}" ExclusivelyForYou="{xml_RoomsInHouse/xml_ExclusivelyForYou}" SharedWithOthers="{xml_RoomsInHouse/xml_SharedWithOthers}" />
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</RoomsInHouse>
						<Garden>{xml_Garden}</Garden>
						<!--@af:if({parkingSpace/Includes}!='') -->
							<ParkingSpace>{parkingSpace/Includes}</ParkingSpace>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({xml_LandlordRelated}='yes') -->
						<LandlordRelationship>{Landlord_Relationship/xml_LandlordRelationship}</LandlordRelationship>
						<WhoIsRelatedToLandlord>{Landlord_Relationship/xml_WhoIsRelatedToLandlord}</WhoIsRelatedToLandlord>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</PropertyDetail>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({requireRentInfo}='1' and {UCund}!='CTR') -->
					<!--@af:if({pay_rent_also_owner}='yes') -->
					<Landlord>
						<!--@af:if({payLandComp}='comp') -->
							<LandlordBusinessName>{Name_Company}</LandlordBusinessName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({payLandComp}='ind') -->
							<LandlordIndividualName>
								<!--@af:if({LN_Title}!='') -->
								<PersonNameTitle xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{LN_Title}</PersonNameTitle>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{LN_First_Name}</PersonGivenName>
								<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{LN_Surname}</PersonFamilyName>
							</LandlordIndividualName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({Address_pay/AddrConcat}!='') -->
							<LandlordAddress>
								<Line>{Address_pay/AddrConcat}</Line>
								<Line>a</Line>
							</LandlordAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({Address_pay/AddrConcat}='') -->
							<LandlordAddress>
								<Line>Not Provided</Line>
								<Line>a</Line>
							</LandlordAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Landlord>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({pay_rent_also_owner}!='yes') -->
					<!--@af:if({checkOwner}!='') -->
						<Landlord>
							<!--@af:if({ownerLandComp}='comp') -->
								<LandlordBusinessName>{Name_Company_owner}</LandlordBusinessName>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({ownerLandComp}='ind') -->
								<LandlordIndividualName>
									<!--@af:if({OW_Title}!='') -->
									<PersonNameTitle xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{OW_Title}</PersonNameTitle>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{OW_First_Name}</PersonGivenName>
									<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{OW_Surname}</PersonFamilyName>
								</LandlordIndividualName>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({Address_owner/AddrConcat}!='') -->
								<LandlordAddress>
									<Line>{Address_owner/AddrConcat}</Line>
									<Line>a</Line>
								</LandlordAddress>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({Address_owner/AddrConcat}='') -->
								<LandlordAddress>
									<Line>Not Provided</Line>
									<Line>a</Line>
								</LandlordAddress>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</Landlord>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<LandlordAgent>
						<!--@af:if({payLandComp}='comp') -->
							<AgentsBusinessName>{Name_Company}</AgentsBusinessName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({payLandComp}='ind') -->
							<AgentsName>
								<!--@af:if({LN_Title}!='') -->
								<PersonNameTitle xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{LN_Title}</PersonNameTitle>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{LN_First_Name}</PersonGivenName>
								<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{LN_Surname}</PersonFamilyName>
							</AgentsName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({Address_pay/AddrConcat}!='') -->
							<AgentsBusinessAddress>
								<Line>{Address_pay/AddrConcat}</Line>
								<Line>a</Line>
							</AgentsBusinessAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({Address_pay/AddrConcat}='') -->
							<LandlordAddress>
								<Line>Not Provided</Line>
								<Line>a</Line>
							</LandlordAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</LandlordAgent>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<Rent>
						<ClaimantsRent>
							<HowMuch>{xml_ClaimantsRent}</HowMuch>
							<Frequency>{xml_ClaimantsRent_freq}</Frequency>
						</ClaimantsRent>
						<!--@af:if({requireRentInfoC}='1') -->
							<!--@af:if({xml_AnyRentFree}='yes') -->
							<RentFreeWeeks>
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_RentFreeWeeks}) -->
								<RentFreeWeek StartDate="{xml_RentFreeWeeks/xml_RentFree_StartDate}" EndDate="{xml_RentFreeWeeks/xml_RentFree_EndDate}" PeriodName="{xml_RentFreeWeeks/xml_RentFree_Period}"/>
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
								<NoOfRentFreeWeeks>{xml_RentFreeWeeks_Count}</NoOfRentFreeWeeks>
							</RentFreeWeeks>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<Services>
								<!--@af:repeat({Services_Included}) -->
								<Service ServiceType="{Services_Included/service}" Amount="{Services_Included/weeklyValue}" />
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
								<!--@af:if({Rent_Includes_GarageParking/Includes}='yes') -->
									<Service ServiceType="Garage" Amount="{Rent_Includes_GarageParking/weeklyValue}" />
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--@af:if({parkingSpace/Includes}='yes') -->
									<Service ServiceType="Parking" Amount="{parkingSpace/weeklyValue}" />
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
							</Services>
							<LocalHousingAllowance>
								<LocalHousingAllowanceAuthority>yes</LocalHousingAllowanceAuthority>
								<LocalHousingAllowanceClaim>yes</LocalHousingAllowanceClaim>
							</LocalHousingAllowance>
							<!--@af:if({xml_CurrentAddressRentArrearsAmount}!='') -->
								<RentArrears>
									<CurrentAddressRentArrearsAmount>{xml_CurrentAddressRentArrearsAmount}</CurrentAddressRentArrearsAmount>
								</RentArrears>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Rent>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_Property_YesNo}='yes') -->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_Property}) -->
							<SecondHome>
								<Address>
									<Line>{xml_CSI_Property/AddrConcat}</Line>
									<Line>a</Line>
								</Address>
							</SecondHome>
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({checkCTLiability} = '1') -->
					<CouncilTax>
						<JointCouncilTaxLiabilityPercentage>{xml_JointCouncilTaxLiabilityPercentage}</JointCouncilTaxLiabilityPercentage>
					</CouncilTax>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
				</Property>
				<HouseholdMember>
					<GeneralDetails>
						<HouseholdMemberName>
							<Name>
								<PersonNameTitle xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{CoC_ClaimantName/Title_out}</PersonNameTitle>
								<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{CoC_ClaimantName/First_Name_out}</PersonGivenName>
								<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{CoC_ClaimantName/Surname_out}</PersonFamilyName>
								<!--@af:if({anyOtherNamesYou} != '') -->
								<PersonRequestedName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{CoC_ClaimantName/OtherNames_out}</PersonRequestedName>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
							</Name>
							<!--@af:if({HouseHoldMember_You/xml_NINO} != '') -->
								<NINO>{HouseHoldMember_You/xml_NINO}</NINO>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<DateOfBirth>{CoC_ClaimantName/Date_Of_Birth_out}</DateOfBirth>
						</HouseholdMemberName>
						<Role>Claimant</Role>
						<Gender>Unknown</Gender>
						<RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
							<InRelationship>no</InRelationship>
						</RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
						<!--@af:if({Rent_Includes_Meals/Includes} = 'yes') -->
							<MealsIncludedInRent>{Rent_Includes_Meals/xml_Meals}</MealsIncludedInRent>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<Nationality>{HouseHoldMember_You_Discounts/xml_Nationality}</Nationality>
						<!--@af:if({HouseHoldMember_You_Discounts/xml_LastFiveYears} = 'yes') -->
							<DateEnteredUK>{HouseHoldMember_You_Discounts/xml_DateEnteredUK}</DateEnteredUK>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</GeneralDetails>
					<Statuses>
						<!--@af:if({HouseHoldMember_You_Discounts/xml_SomebodyGetsCarersAllowance}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>CaredFor</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({HouseHoldMember_You_Discounts/in_hospital}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Hospital</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({HouseHoldMember_You_Discounts/checkStudent}='1') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Student</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({HouseHoldMember_You_Discounts/Do_you_get_Disability_Living_Allowance_}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Disabled</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({xml_getting_waiting_for_IS}='Receiving') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>{xml_TypeOfStatus}</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Statuses>
					<EarnedIncomes>
						<!--@af:if({claimantEmpDetails} = 1) -->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_Employer_You}) -->
						<EarnedIncome>
							<TypeOfEarnedIncome>Employed</TypeOfEarnedIncome>
							<HoursPerWeek>{xml_Employer_You/xml_HoursPerWeek}</HoursPerWeek>
							<PaymentFrequency>{xml_Employer_You/xml_GrossAmount_Frequency}</PaymentFrequency>
							<GrossAmount>{xml_Employer_You/xml_GrossAmount_Payment}</GrossAmount>
							<EmploymentDetail>
								<Employer>
									<CompanyName>{xml_Employer_You/xml_BusinessPersonName}</CompanyName>
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/AddrConcat} = '') -->
										<Address>
											<Line>not provided</Line>
											<Line>a</Line>
										</Address>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/AddrConcat} != '') -->
										<Address>
											<Line>{xml_Employer_You/AddrConcat}</Line>
											<Line>a</Line>
										</Address>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								</Employer>
								<EmployeeReference>{xml_Employer_You/xml_EmployeeReference}</EmployeeReference>
								<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/xml_StartDate} != '') -->
									<EmploymentStartDate>{xml_Employer_You/xml_StartDate}</EmploymentStartDate>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<TypeOfWork>{xml_Employer_You/xml_TypeOfWork}</TypeOfWork>
								<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/xml_DateOfLastPayIncrease}!='') -->
									<DateOfLastPayIncrease>{xml_Employer_You/xml_DateOfLastPayIncrease}</DateOfLastPayIncrease>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/xml_DateOfNextPayIncrease}!='') -->
									<DateOfNextPayIncrease>{xml_Employer_You/xml_DateOfNextPayIncrease}</DateOfNextPayIncrease>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/xml_EmploymentPeriodIndicator}='yes') -->
									<EmploymentPeriodIndicator>fixed</EmploymentPeriodIndicator>
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/xml_EmploymentEndDate}!='') -->
										<EmploymentEndDate>{xml_Employer_You/xml_EmploymentEndDate}</EmploymentEndDate>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/xml_EmploymentPeriodIndicator}='no') -->
									<EmploymentPeriodIndicator>continuous</EmploymentPeriodIndicator>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--<MainEmployer>YesorNo</MainEmployer>-->
								<MethodOfPayment>{xml_Employer_You/xml_MethodOfPayment}</MethodOfPayment>
							</EmploymentDetail>
							<Payslips />
						</EarnedIncome>
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({Work_SelfEmployed}='yes') -->
						<EarnedIncome>
							<TypeOfEarnedIncome>SelfEmployed</TypeOfEarnedIncome>
							<!--@af:if({xml_Self_BusinessName}!='') -->
								<HoursPerWeek>{xml_Self_HoursPerWeek}</HoursPerWeek>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<Payslips />
							<!--@af:if({xml_Self_BusinessName}!='') -->
								<SelfEmployedDetail>
									<BusinessName>{xml_Self_BusinessName}</BusinessName>
									<BusinessType>{xml_Self_BusinessType}</BusinessType>
									<!--@af:if({xml_Self_Business_StartDate}!='') -->
										<StartDate>{xml_Self_Business_StartDate}</StartDate>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Self_PrivatePension_YesNo}='yes') -->
									<OccupationalPensionAmount>
										<HowMuch>{xml_Self_OccupationalPensionAmount_HowMuch_HowOften}</HowMuch>
										<Frequency>{xml_PensionPayment_freq}</Frequency>
									</OccupationalPensionAmount>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<SelfEmployedExpenses>
										<!--@af:if({Are_your_business_records_complete_so_that_the_information_below_can_be_completed_today_} = 'yes') -->
										  <!--@af:repeat({SelfEmploymentExpenses}) -->
											<SelfEmployedExpense ExpenseType="{SelfEmploymentExpenses/xml_type}" Amount="{SelfEmploymentExpenses/Amount}"/>
										  <!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
									</SelfEmployedExpenses>
									<!--@af:if({xml_Self_UseHome}='yes') -->
									<Address>
										<Line>{CoC_ClaimantName/AddrConcat}</Line>
										<Line>a</Line>
									</Address>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Self_UseHome}='no') -->
									<Address>
										<Line>{xml_Self_Address/AddrConcat}</Line>
										<Line>a</Line>
									</Address>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Self_Partners_YesNo}='yes') -->
									<Partners>
										<!--@af:repeat({xml_Self_Partners}) -->
										<!--@af:if({xml_Self_Partners/xml_PartnerName}!='') -->
											<Partner>
												<Name>{xml_Self_Partners/xml_PartnerName}</Name>
												<!--@af:if({xml_Self_Partners/AddrConcat}!='') -->
													<Address>
														<Line>{xml_Self_Partners/AddrConcat}</Line>
														<Line>a</Line>
													</Address>
												<!--@endaf:if end-->
												<!--@af:if({xml_Self_Partners/AddrConcat}='') -->
													<Address>
														<Line>not provided</Line>
														<Line>a</Line>
													</Address>
												<!--@endaf:if end-->
											</Partner>
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
										<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
									</Partners>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Self_AdditionalAllowanceApplies}='yes') -->
									<BusinessStartupAllowance>
										<HowMuch>{howMuchAreYouGet}</HowMuch>
										<Frequency>{xml_NetAmount_freq}</Frequency>
									</BusinessStartupAllowance>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								</SelfEmployedDetail>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</EarnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</EarnedIncomes>
					<UnearnedIncomes>
						<!--@af:if({ucRecieving} = 'yes') -->
							<UnearnedIncome>
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>UniversalCredit</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
								<NetAmount>{ucTotal}</NetAmount>
								<PaymentFrequency>monthly</PaymentFrequency>
							</UnearnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_Benefit}) -->
							<!--@af:if({xml_Benefit/Recipient}!='Your partner') -->
								<!--@af:if({xml_Benefit/waiting_getting}='Getting now') -->
									<UnearnedIncome>
										<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>{xml_Benefit/xml_TypeOfUnEarnedIncome}</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
										<NetAmount>{xml_Benefit/howMuchAreYouGet}</NetAmount>
										<PaymentFrequency>{xml_Benefit/xml_NetAmount_freq}</PaymentFrequency>
										<!--@af:if({xml_Benefit/xml_PaymentMethod}!='') -->
											<PaymentMethod>{xml_Benefit/xml_PaymentMethod}</PaymentMethod>
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
									</UnearnedIncome>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_OtherMoney}) -->
						<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/xml_Who}!='Your partner') -->
						<UnearnedIncome>
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/checkIsListValue}='') -->
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>Other</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/checkIsListValue}!='') -->
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>{xml_OtherMoney/IncomeCode}</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<NetAmount>{xml_OtherMoney/xml_NetAmount}</NetAmount>
							<PaymentFrequency>{xml_OtherMoney/xml_NetAmount_freq}</PaymentFrequency>
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/xml_PaymentMethod}!='') -->
								<PaymentMethod>{xml_OtherMoney/xml_PaymentMethod}</PaymentMethod>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</UnearnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
					</UnearnedIncomes>
					<Capital>
						<!--@af:if({xml_Capital_YesNo}='yes') -->
							<!--@af:repeat({xml_CapitalAccounts}) -->
								<!--@af:if({xml_CapitalAccounts/xml_Who}!='Your Partner') -->
									<CapitalItem>
										<TypeOfCapital>BankAccount</TypeOfCapital>
										<Amount>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Account_Amount}</Amount>
										<NameOfCompany>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Account_BankName}</NameOfCompany>
										<BankDetail>
											<SortCode>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Sort_code}</SortCode>
											<AccountNumber>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Account_Number}</AccountNumber>
											<AccountName>Claimant</AccountName>
										</BankDetail>
									</CapitalItem>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_PremiumBonds_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_PremiumBonds}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_PremiumBonds/xml_Who}!='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>PremiumBonds</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_PremiumBonds/xml_Value}</Amount>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_Shares_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_Shares}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Who}!='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>Shares</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Value}</Amount>
											<NameOfCompany>{xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Shares_NameOfCompany}</NameOfCompany>
											<NumberOfShares>{xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Shares_NumberOfShares}</NumberOfShares>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_NationalSavings_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_NSC}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_NSC/xml_Who}!='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>NationalSavings</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_NSC/xml_Value}</Amount>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherCapital_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_OtherCapital}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_OtherCapital/xml_Who}!='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>Other</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_OtherCapital/xml_Value}</Amount>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Capital>
					<Expenses>
						<!--<BackOfficeCode />
						<UniqueId />-->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_Employer_You}) -->
							<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_You/xml_Employer_Pension_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<Expense>
									<TypeOfExpense>OccPension</TypeOfExpense>
									<Amount>
										<HowMuch>{xml_Employer_You/xml_GrossAmount_Payment1}</HowMuch>
										<Frequency>{xml_Employer_You/xml_GrossAmount_Frequency1}</Frequency>
									</Amount>
								</Expense>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
						<!--@af:if({xml_Self_PrivatePension_YesNo}='yes') -->
							<Expense>
								<TypeOfExpense>OccPension</TypeOfExpense>
								<Amount>
									<HowMuch>{xml_Self_OccupationalPensionAmount_HowMuch_HowOften}</HowMuch>
									<Frequency>{xml_PensionPayment_freq}</Frequency>
								</Amount>
							</Expense>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Expenses>
					<!--@af:if({Extra_money/Are_you_or_your_partner_expecting_to_get_any_money_in_the_next_12_months_}='yes') -->
					<!--@af:if({Extra_money/Are_you_or_your_partner_expecting_to_get_any_money_in_the_next_12_months_}!='Your partner') -->
						<FutureIncomes>
							<Name>{Extra_money/What_for_}</Name>
							<Amount>{Extra_money/How_much_}</Amount>
						</FutureIncomes>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
				</HouseholdMember>
				<!--@af:if({havePartner}=1) -->
				<HouseholdMember>
					<GeneralDetails>
						<HouseholdMemberName>
							<Name>
								<PersonNameTitle xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{houseHoldMember_Partner/Title_cl}</PersonNameTitle>
								<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{houseHoldMember_Partner/First_Name_cl}</PersonGivenName>
								<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{houseHoldMember_Partner/Surname_cl}</PersonFamilyName>
							</Name>
							<!--@af:if({houseHoldMember_Partner/xml_NINO}!='') -->
								<NINO>{houseHoldMember_Partner/xml_NINO}</NINO>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<DateOfBirth>{houseHoldMember_Partner/Date_Of_Birth_cl}</DateOfBirth>
						</HouseholdMemberName>
						<Role>Partner</Role>
						<Gender>Unknown</Gender>
						<RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
							<InRelationship>no</InRelationship>
						</RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
						<Nationality>{houseHoldMember_Partner_Discounts/xml_Nationality}</Nationality>
						<!--@af:if({houseHoldMember_Partner_Discounts/xml_LastFiveYears} = 'yes') -->
							<DateEnteredUK>{houseHoldMember_Partner_Discounts/xml_DateEnteredUK}</DateEnteredUK>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</GeneralDetails>
					<Statuses>
						<!--@af:if({houseHoldMember_Partner_Discounts/xml_SomebodyGetsCarersAllowance}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>CaredFor</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({houseHoldMember_Partner_Discounts/in_hospital}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Hospital</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({houseHoldMember_Partner_Discounts/checkStudent}='1') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Student</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({houseHoldMember_Partner_Discounts/Do_you_get_Disability_Living_Allowance_}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Disabled</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({partnerintrobenefits/xml_getting_waiting_for_IS_Partner}='Receiving') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>{partnerintrobenefits/xml_TypeOfStatus_Partner}</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Statuses>
					<EarnedIncomes>
						<!--@af:if({partnerEmpDetails} = 1) -->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_Employer_Partner}) -->
							<EarnedIncome>
								<TypeOfEarnedIncome>Employed</TypeOfEarnedIncome>
								<HoursPerWeek>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_HoursPerWeek}</HoursPerWeek>
								<PaymentFrequency>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_GrossAmount_Frequency}</PaymentFrequency>
								<GrossAmount>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_GrossAmount_Payment}</GrossAmount>
								<EmploymentDetail>
									<Employer>
										<CompanyName>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_BusinessPersonName}</CompanyName>
										<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/AddrConcat}='') -->
											<Address>
												<Line>not provided</Line>
												<Line>a</Line>
											</Address>
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
										<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/AddrConcat}!='') -->
											<Address>
												<Line>{xml_Employer_Partner/AddrConcat}</Line>
												<Line>a</Line>
											</Address>
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
									</Employer>
									<EmployeeReference>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_EmployeeReference}</EmployeeReference>
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/xml_StartDate}!='') -->
										<EmploymentStartDate>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_StartDate}</EmploymentStartDate>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<TypeOfWork>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_TypeOfWork}</TypeOfWork>
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/xml_DateOfLastPayIncrease}!='') -->
										<DateOfLastPayIncrease>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_DateOfLastPayIncrease}</DateOfLastPayIncrease>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/xml_DateOfNextPayIncrease}!='') -->
										<DateOfNextPayIncrease>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_DateOfNextPayIncrease}</DateOfNextPayIncrease>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/xml_EmploymentPeriodIndicator}='yes') -->
										<EmploymentPeriodIndicator>fixed</EmploymentPeriodIndicator>
										<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/xml_EmploymentEndDate}!='') -->
											<EmploymentEndDate>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_EmploymentEndDate}</EmploymentEndDate>
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/xml_EmploymentPeriodIndicator}='no') -->
										<EmploymentPeriodIndicator>continuous</EmploymentPeriodIndicator>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<MethodOfPayment>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_MethodOfPayment}</MethodOfPayment>
								</EmploymentDetail>
								<Payslips />
							</EarnedIncome>
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({partnerintrowork/Work_SelfEmployed_Partner}='yes') -->
						<EarnedIncome>
							<TypeOfEarnedIncome>SelfEmployed</TypeOfEarnedIncome>
							<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_HoursPerWeek}!='') -->
								<HoursPerWeek>{xml_SelfPartner_HoursPerWeek}</HoursPerWeek>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<Payslips />
							<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_BusinessName}!='') -->
								<SelfEmployedDetail>
									<BusinessName>{xml_SelfPartner_BusinessName}</BusinessName>
									<BusinessType>{xml_SelfPartner_BusinessType}</BusinessType>
									<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_Business_StartDate}!='') -->
										<StartDate>{xml_SelfPartner_Business_StartDate}</StartDate>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_PrivatePension_YesNo}='yes') -->
									<OccupationalPensionAmount>
										<HowMuch>{xml_SelfPartner_OccupationalPensionAmount_HowMuch_HowOften}</HowMuch>
										<Frequency>{xml_Partner_PensionPayment_freq}</Frequency>
									</OccupationalPensionAmount>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<SelfEmployedExpenses>
										<!--@af:if({Are_your_partner_s_business_records_complete_so_that_the_information_below_can_be_completed_today_} = 'yes') -->
										  <!--@af:repeat({PartnerSelfEmploymentExpenses}) -->
											<SelfEmployedExpense ExpenseType="{PartnerSelfEmploymentExpenses/xml_type}" Amount="{PartnerSelfEmploymentExpenses/Amount}"/>
										  <!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
									</SelfEmployedExpenses>
									<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_UseHome}='yes') -->
									<Address>
										<Line>{CoC_ClaimantName/AddrConcat}</Line>
										<Line>a</Line>
									</Address>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_UseHome}='no') -->
									<Address>
										<Line>{xml_SelfPartner_Address/AddrConcat}</Line>
										<Line>a</Line>
									</Address>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_Partners_YesNo}='yes') -->
									<Partners>
										<!--@af:repeat({xml_SelfPartner_Partners}) -->
										<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_Partners/xml_PartnerName}!='') -->
											<Partner>
												<Name>{xml_SelfPartner_Partners/xml_PartnerName}</Name>
												<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_Partners/AddrConcat}!='') -->
													<Address>
														<Line>{xml_SelfPartner_Partners/AddrConcat}</Line>
														<Line>a</Line>
													</Address>
												<!--@endaf:if end-->
												<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_Partners/AddrConcat}='') -->
													<Address>
														<Line>not provided</Line>
														<Line>a</Line>
													</Address>
												<!--@endaf:if end-->
											</Partner>
										<!--@endaf:if end-->
										<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
									</Partners>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_AdditionalAllowanceApplies}='yes') -->
									<BusinessStartupAllowance>
										<HowMuch>{xml_SelfPartner_BusinessStartupAllowance_HowMuch_HowOften}</HowMuch>
										<Frequency>{xml_Part_EntAllowance_freq}</Frequency>
									</BusinessStartupAllowance>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								</SelfEmployedDetail>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</EarnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</EarnedIncomes>
					<UnearnedIncomes>
						<!--@af:if({partnerintrobenefits/ucRecieving} = 'yes') -->
							<UnearnedIncome>
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>UniversalCredit</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
								<NetAmount>{ucTotal1}</NetAmount>
								<PaymentFrequency>monthly</PaymentFrequency>
							</UnearnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_Benefit}) -->
						<!--@af:if({xml_Benefit/Recipient}='Your partner') -->
						<!--@af:if({xml_Benefit/waiting_getting}='Getting now') -->
						<UnearnedIncome>
							<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>{xml_Benefit/xml_TypeOfUnEarnedIncome}</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
							<NetAmount>{xml_Benefit/howMuchAreYouGet}</NetAmount>
							<PaymentFrequency>{xml_Benefit/xml_NetAmount_freq}</PaymentFrequency>
							<!--@af:if({xml_Benefit/xml_PaymentMethod}!='') -->
								<PaymentMethod>{xml_Benefit/xml_PaymentMethod}</PaymentMethod>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</UnearnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_OtherMoney}) -->
						<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/xml_Who}='Your partner') -->
						<UnearnedIncome>
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/checkIsListValue}='') -->
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>Other</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/checkIsListValue}!='') -->
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>{xml_OtherMoney/IncomeCode}</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<NetAmount>{xml_OtherMoney/xml_NetAmount}</NetAmount>
							<PaymentFrequency>{xml_OtherMoney/xml_NetAmount_freq}</PaymentFrequency>
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherMoney/xml_PaymentMethod}!='') -->
								<PaymentMethod>{xml_OtherMoney/xml_PaymentMethod}</PaymentMethod>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</UnearnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
					</UnearnedIncomes>
					<Capital>
						<!--@af:if({xml_Capital_YesNo}='yes') -->
							<!--@af:repeat({xml_CapitalAccounts}) -->
								<!--@af:if({xml_CapitalAccounts/xml_Who}='Your Partner') -->
									<CapitalItem>
										<TypeOfCapital>BankAccount</TypeOfCapital>
										<Amount>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Account_Amount}</Amount>
										<NameOfCompany>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Account_BankName}</NameOfCompany>
										<BankDetail>
											<SortCode>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Sort_code}</SortCode>
											<AccountNumber>{xml_CapitalAccounts/Account_Number}</AccountNumber>
											<AccountName>Parther</AccountName>
										</BankDetail>
									</CapitalItem>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_PremiumBonds_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_PremiumBonds}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_PremiumBonds/xml_Who}='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>PremiumBonds</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_PremiumBonds/xml_Value}</Amount>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_Shares_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_Shares}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Who}='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>Shares</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Value}</Amount>
											<NameOfCompany>{xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Shares_NameOfCompany}</NameOfCompany>
											<NumberOfShares>{xml_CSI_Shares/xml_Shares_NumberOfShares}</NumberOfShares>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_NationalSavings_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_NSC}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_NSC/xml_Who}='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>NationalSavings</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_NSC/xml_Value}</Amount>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({xml_OtherCapital_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<!--@af:repeat({xml_CSI_OtherCapital}) -->
									<!--@af:if({xml_CSI_OtherCapital/xml_Who}='Your Partner') -->
										<CapitalItem>
											<TypeOfCapital>Other</TypeOfCapital>
											<Amount>{xml_CSI_OtherCapital/xml_Value}</Amount>
										</CapitalItem>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Capital>
					<Expenses>
						<!--@af:repeat({xml_Employer_Partner}) -->
							<!--@af:if({xml_Employer_Partner/xml_Employer_Pension_YesNo}='yes') -->
								<Expense>
									<TypeOfExpense>OccPension</TypeOfExpense>
									<Amount>
										<HowMuch>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_GrossAmount_Payment1}</HowMuch>
										<Frequency>{xml_Employer_Partner/xml_GrossAmount_Frequency1}</Frequency>
									</Amount>
								</Expense>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
						<!--@af:if({xml_SelfPartner_PrivatePension_YesNo}='yes') -->
							<Expense>
								<TypeOfExpense>OccPension</TypeOfExpense>
								<Amount>
									<HowMuch>{xml_SelfPartner_OccupationalPensionAmount_HowMuch_HowOften}</HowMuch>
									<Frequency>{xml_Partner_PensionPayment_freq}</Frequency>
								</Amount>
							</Expense>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Expenses>
					<!--@af:if({Extra_money/Are_you_or_your_partner_expecting_to_get_any_money_in_the_next_12_months_}='yes') -->
					<!--@af:if({Extra_money/Are_you_or_your_partner_expecting_to_get_any_money_in_the_next_12_months_}='Your partner') -->
						<FutureIncomes>
							<Name>{Extra_money/What_for_}</Name>
							<Amount>{Extra_money/How_much_}</Amount>
						</FutureIncomes>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
				</HouseholdMember>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:repeat({HouseholdMember_Children}) -->
				<HouseholdMember>
					<GeneralDetails>
						<HouseholdMemberName>
							<Name>
								<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{HouseholdMember_Children/xml_PersonGivenName}</PersonGivenName>
								<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{HouseholdMember_Children/xml_PersonFamilyName}</PersonFamilyName>
							</Name>
							<DateOfBirth>{HouseholdMember_Children/xml_DateOfBirth}</DateOfBirth>
						</HouseholdMemberName>  
						<Role>Dependant</Role>
						<Gender>{HouseholdMember_Children/xml_Gender}</Gender>
						<RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
							<InRelationship>yes</InRelationship>
						</RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
						<!--@af:if({HouseholdMember_Children/Is_someone_receiving_Child_Benefit_for_this_child_}='yes') -->
							<ChildBenefitRecipient>{HouseholdMember_Children/xml_ChildBenefitRecipient}</ChildBenefitRecipient>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({HouseholdMember_Children/Payforminder}='yes') -->
							<ChildMinderName>unknown</ChildMinderName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<ChildRelationshipToClaimant>{HouseholdMember_Children/xml_ChildRelationshipToClaimant}</ChildRelationshipToClaimant>
					</GeneralDetails>
					<Statuses>
						<!--@af:if({HouseholdMember_Children/xml_childeducation}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Student</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({HouseholdMember_Children/Is_the_child_registered_blind_}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Blind</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({HouseholdMember_Children/xml_childDLA}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Disabled</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</Statuses>
					<EarnedIncomes/>
					<UnearnedIncomes>
						<!--@af:if({HouseholdMember_Children/xml_childDLA}='yes') -->
							<UnearnedIncome>
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>DisabilityLivingAllowanceMiddleCare</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
								<StartDate>{xml_today}</StartDate>
								<NetAmount>{HouseholdMember_Children/DisabIndepAmount}</NetAmount>
								<PaymentFrequency>{HouseholdMember_Children/every}</PaymentFrequency>
							</UnearnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</UnearnedIncomes>
					<Capital/>
					<Expenses/>
					<!--@af:if({HouseholdMember_Children/leave_FT_Ed}!='') -->
						<StudentDetails>
							<StudyPeriodEnd>{HouseholdMember_Children/leave_FT_Ed}</StudyPeriodEnd>
						</StudentDetails>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
				</HouseholdMember>
				<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
				<!--@af:repeat({About_other_people}) -->
				<HouseholdMember>
					<GeneralDetails>
						<HouseholdMemberName>
							<Name>
								<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{About_other_people/xml_PersonGivenName}</PersonGivenName>
								<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{About_other_people/xml_PersonFamilyName}</PersonFamilyName>
							</Name>
							<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_NINO}!='') -->
								<NINO>{About_other_people/xml_NINO}</NINO>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<DateOfBirth>{About_other_people/xml_DateofBirth}</DateOfBirth>
						</HouseholdMemberName>
						<Role>Unknown</Role>
						<Gender>Unknown</Gender>
						<RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
							<InRelationship>no</InRelationship>
						</RelationshipWithOtherNonDependant>
						<RelationshipToClaimant>{About_other_people/xml_RelationshipToClaimant}</RelationshipToClaimant>
					</GeneralDetails>
					<Statuses>
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_Student}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Student</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_OntrainingScheme}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>OntrainingScheme</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_Carer}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Carer</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_SeverelyMentallyImpaired}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>SeverelyMentallyImpaired</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_Prisoner}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Prisoner</TypeOfStatus>
								<EndDate>{About_other_people/xml_Prisoner_End}</EndDate>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_Patient}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Patient</TypeOfStatus>
								<StartDate>{About_other_people/xml_Patient_Start}</StartDate>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_Blind}='yes') -->
							<Status>
								<TypeOfStatus>Blind</TypeOfStatus>
							</Status>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->			
					</Statuses>
					<EarnedIncomes>
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_Work_YesNo}='yes') -->
							<EarnedIncome>
								<TypeOfEarnedIncome>Employed</TypeOfEarnedIncome>
								<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_numberhoursworked}!='') -->
									<HoursPerWeek>{About_other_people/xml_numberhoursworked}</HoursPerWeek>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--@af:if({About_other_people/freqOfEarn}!='') -->
									<PaymentFrequency>{About_other_people/freqOfEarn}</PaymentFrequency>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_Work_HowMuch_HowOften}!='') -->
									<GrossAmount>{About_other_people/xml_Work_HowMuch_HowOften}</GrossAmount>
								<!--@endaf:if end-->
								<Payslips />
							</EarnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_OtherIncome_YesNo}='yes') -->
							<EarnedIncome>
								<TypeOfEarnedIncome>Other</TypeOfEarnedIncome>
								<PaymentFrequency>{About_other_people/freqOfInc}</PaymentFrequency>
								<NetAmount>{About_other_people/xml_OtherWork_HowMuch_HowOften}</NetAmount>
								<!--<EmploymentDetail>
									<TypeOfWork>{About_other_people/xml_OtherTypeOfWork}</TypeOfWork>
								</EmploymentDetail>-->
								<Payslips />
							</EarnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</EarnedIncomes>
					<UnearnedIncomes>
						<!--@af:if({About_other_people/xml_DLA_YesNo}='yes') -->
							<UnearnedIncome>
								<TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>DisabilityLivingAllowanceMiddleCare</TypeOfUnEarnedIncome>
								<PaymentFrequency>{About_other_people/freqOfPay}</PaymentFrequency>
								<NetAmount>{About_other_people/xml_DLA_Amount}</NetAmount>
							</UnearnedIncome>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</UnearnedIncomes>
					<Capital/>
					<Expenses/>
				</HouseholdMember>
				<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
				<PaymentDetail>
					<!--
					<Payee>{Payee:string}</Payee>
					<TenantsAccountReference>{TenantsAccountReference:string}</TenantsAccountReference>
					<ThirdPartyDetail>
						<ThirdPartyIndividualName>
							<PersonNameTitle xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{PersonNameTitle:string}</PersonNameTitle>
							<PersonGivenName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{PersonGivenName:string}</PersonGivenName>
							<PersonFamilyName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{PersonFamilyName:string}</PersonFamilyName>
							<PersonNameSuffix>{PersonNameSuffix:string}</PersonNameSuffix>
							<PersonRequestedName xmlns="http://www.govtalk.gov.uk/people/PersonDescriptives">{PersonRequestedName:string}</PersonRequestedName>
						</ThirdPartyIndividualName>
						<ThirdPartyBusinessName>{ThirdPartyBusinessName:string}</ThirdPartyBusinessName>
						<ThirdPartyAddress>
							<UniquePropertyReferenceNumber>{UniquePropertyReferenceNumber:integer}</UniquePropertyReferenceNumber>
							<AlternatePropertyReference>{AlternatePropertyReference:string}</AlternatePropertyReference>
						</ThirdPartyAddress>
					</ThirdPartyDetail>
					-->
					<MethodOfPayment>
						<!--@af:if({paymentMethodCode} = 'RA') -->
							<Other>
								<Description>Direct to Rent Account</Description>
							</Other>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({paymentMethodCode} = 'LL') -->
							<Other>
								<Description>Direct to Landlord</Description>
							</Other>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({paymentMethodCode} = 'BA') -->
							<Account>
								<BankDetail>
									<BankName>{Full_name_of_the_bank_or_building_society}</BankName>
									<SortCode>{Sort_code}</SortCode>
									<AccountNumber>{Account_number}</AccountNumber>
									<AccountName>{Name_of_the_account_holder}</AccountName>
									<!--@af:if({Building_society_roll_or_reference_number} != '') -->
										<RollNumber>{Building_society_roll_or_reference_number}</RollNumber>
									<!--@endaf:if end-->
									<!--<ChequeOrSavingsAccount />
									<AccountType />-->
								</BankDetail>
							</Account>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({paymentMethodCode} = 'OT') -->
							<Other>
								<Description>Other Payment Method</Description>
							</Other>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!-- <Cheque>{Cheque:}</Cheque> -->
					</MethodOfPayment>
				</PaymentDetail>
				
			</HB_CTB_Application>
		</claimApplication>
	</GetClaimVerification>
</soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
<xsl:template match="Envelope/Body/GetClaimVerificationResponse/GetClaimVerificationResult">
  <body>
	<GetClaimVerificationResult>
		<RiskScoreNinoValidation>
			<Nino><xsl:value-of select="NinoValidation/Result/Nino"/></Nino>
			<ValidationCode><xsl:value-of select="NinoValidation/Result/ValidationCode"/></ValidationCode>
			<ValidationReason><xsl:value-of select="NinoValidation/Result/ValidationReason"/></ValidationReason>
			<RiskValue><xsl:value-of select="RiskScore/RiskValue"/></RiskValue>
			<RiskCategory><xsl:value-of select="RiskScore/RiskCategory"/></RiskCategory>
			<RiskDescription><xsl:value-of select="RiskScore/RiskDescription"/></RiskDescription>
		</RiskScoreNinoValidation>
	</GetClaimVerificationResult>
  </body>
</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"RiskScoreNinoValidation","results_page_columns":""}
